item.description:
Hello mighty incubators who may or may not like cheesy yet awesome horror movie sequels!

Some of you may be like Jason, wtf is going on there hasnt been an incubator for what seems like forever, its only been two weeks shhhh.

Well this week, I'd like to welcome everyone back! We'll be in the room to left as soon soon as you walk in the door at Democracy Center.

As usual, bring smiles, friends, and some energy if you can. If not we'll instill you with some.

Remember no previous improv experience required.

$3 suggested donation for rental of space and running the meetup.

Any comments, any questions? Email me!

Cheers!

Jason J.
item.name: We're back with Improvmaster 2: Ding Never Dies
